data.title: Review & video of 'Half-Blood Prince' video game
meta_keywords: harry potter and the half-blood prince video game
data.meta_description: A Nintendo DS review of the "Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince" video game as well as a video are now online. The interview touches on the games, features and once again Quidditch. The video shows Hogwarts grounds and school, Quidditch, dueling and potions class.
data.text:
August 14, 2008 at 2:02 PM ET

Geri HPANA (via Various)

harry potter and the half-blood prince video game, hbp video game, half-blood prince video game

A Nintendo DS review of the Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince video game as well as a video are now online. The interview touches on the games, features and once again Quidditch. The video shows Hogwarts grounds and school, Quidditch, dueling and potions class.

The video game will be available on all platforms and be released on November 11, 2008 according to the articles.
